title: Grim reaper. Parts 1 & 2
brief_description: In part 1, entitled “The True story” Professor John Dwyer of the University of New South Wales discusses the causes and effects of AIDS with a group of Year 10 to Year 12 students. In Part 2, “Education’s responsibilities” Professor Dwyer leads a discussion with a principal, teachers, health worker and school counsellor on the problems that may arise in schools because of AIDS education. An example of a successful school program is included.
